O

Observer - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.controller.observers
Interface for observer method
onChatButtonMouseClick() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameViewController
This method is called whenever the chat button is clicked.
onConnectButtonClick() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.HelloController
Method called when the connect button is clicked It checks if the parameters inserted in the text fields are correct and then tries to connect to the server At the end displays the new buttons used for accessing a game When it connects it preloads the game scene
onCreateButtonClick() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.HelloController
Method called when the create game button is clicked It displays all the information for the correct creation of the game
onGameBoardCanvasClick(MouseEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameViewController
Method that is called whenever the mouse is clicked on the game board canvas
onGameBoardCanvasDragDetected(MouseEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameViewController
This method checks if a drag is started on the game board If there is, it takes the image and the position and adds it to a clipboard, which lets the user drag the tile on the screen
onGameBoardCanvasHover(MouseEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameViewController
Method that is called whenever the mouse is hovered/moved on the game board canvas
onGoButtonClick() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.HelloController
Method called when the go button is clicked It asks the server to create a new game and changes scene afterward
onInsertNameButtonClick() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.HelloController
Method called when the insert name button is clicked It sends to the server the nickname and proceeds to display the buttons for the creation and the joining of a game
onJoinRandomButtonClick() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.HelloController
Method called when the join button is clicked It tries to join a game and changes scene afterward if successful
onJoinSelectedButtonClick() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.HelloController
Method called when the join button is clicked It tries to join a game and changes scene afterward if successful
onMoveListCanvasClick(MouseEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameViewController
This method is called whenever the move list canvas is clicked.
onMoveListCanvasDragDropped(DragEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameViewController
This method is called when the drag on the move list canvas is dropped.
onMoveListCanvasDragOver(DragEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameViewController
This method is called whenever the drag enters the move list, in order to set that image as a "target" where the move can be dropped
onMyShelfCanvasClick(MouseEvent) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GameViewController
Method that is called whenever the mouse is clicked on the shelf canvas It takes the column where the mouse clicks and tries to send the move to the server
onRecoverButtonClick() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.HelloController
Method called when the recover button is clicked It tries to recover a game (if there is one already with its name, it will join it)
onRefreshLobbiesButtonClick() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.HelloController
This method is called when the corresponding button is clicked.
OTHERPOINTS - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.ClickableComponentSetup
This enum contains all the information for the setup of the clickable component class for the other player common goals points
OTHERSHELF - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.ClickableComponentSetup
This enum contains all the information for the setup of the clickable component class for the other player shelves
